nodes.text: Bark mites were arthropods on Rori and Endor. They ate bark, and made large hives in trees and caves.
Bark mites were herbivorous insects. They were usually docile but they could become aggressive when protecting their lair.

During the Galactic Civil War, a colony of giants bark mites lived in a cave on the Nabooian moon of Rori. The creatures had discovered that the cave wass damp and warm, making it a perfect nursery for their brood.

After the Battle of Yavin, Doctor Maldien conducted illegal and highly dangerous bioengineering experiments in a laboratory on Corellia to create very aggressive and intelligent creatures. This included engineered bark mites.
Bark mites appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
